acceptInvitationByAdmin(address).details: The accepted moment will be recorded with the block number The participant must exist, and be pending in order to accept see {participantExistsAndIsPending}Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

acceptInvitationToParticipate().details: The accepted/rejected moment will be recorded with the block numberThe participant must exist, be the sender, and be pending in order to accept see {onlyExistantAndPendingParticipant}

addParticipant(address).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

params._participantAddr: address Participant Address to add in the Ronda

addParticipants(address[]).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

params._addresses: address[] array of participants address to be added into the Ronda

changeAdmin(address).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

deletePayment(uint256).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

getCharge(uint256).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}
getCharge(uint256).return: address who made ituint256 at what momentuint32 the amount

getParticipant(address).details: Only the admin should use this function see {onlyAdmin}
getParticipant(address).return: address of the participantuint256 accepted or rejected momentParticipantState state of the participant see {ParticipantState}address who made the action of reject or accept?bool internal use to see if the participant exists or not in Ronda

getPayment(uint256).details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}
getPayment(uint256).return: address who made ituint256 at what momentuint32 the amount

getQuantityOfCharges().details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}
getQuantityOfCharges().return: uint256 number of charges of the round.

getQuantityOfPayments().details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}
getQuantityOfPayments().return: uint256 number of payments of the round.

makeCharge(uint32).details: Any participant may call this function as long as they exist in the round see {participantExistsInRound}

makePayment(uint32).details: Any participant may call this function as long as they exist in the round see {participantExistsInRound}

params._addr: address This is the address of the participant we are checking

rejectInvitationByAdmin(address).details: The rejected moment will be recorded with the block numberThe participant must exist, and be pending in order to accept see {participantExistsAndIsPending}Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

rejectInvitationToParticipate().details: The accepted/rejected moment will be recorded with the block numberThe participant must exist, be the sender, and be pending in order to accept see {onlyExistantAndPendingParticipant}

replaceParticipant(address,address).details: In case that the round hasn't started, the participant will be in a pending stateIn started rounds it will be automatically acceptedThe participant must exist in round see {participantExistsInRound}Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

start().details: Only the admin may call this function see {onlyAdmin}

acceptInvitationByAdmin(address).notice: The admin may call this function to ACCEPT the invitation to a Round of a participant.

acceptInvitationToParticipate().notice: A participant may call this function to accept the invitation to a Round.

addParticipant(address).notice: Given an address, add it as a participant to the round, same as the addParticipants but only 1 at a time

addParticipants(address[]).notice: Given an array of addresses (who will be participants) it adds them to the round and stores them Participants will be in a pending state until they accept or reject the round invitation

changeAdmin(address).notice: Allows the admin to pass the admin to another address

deletePayment(uint256).notice: Allows the admin to delete a payment and mark it as deleted with its block number

getCharge(uint256).notice: Allows the admin to inspect the data of a given payment number

getParticipant(address).notice: Given a certain address of participant, return the participant data related it

getPayment(uint256).notice: Allows the admin to inspect the data of a given payment number

getQuantityOfCharges().notice: Allows the admin to get the current quantity of charges registered on the Round

getQuantityOfPayments().notice: Allows the admin to get the current quantity of payments registered on the Round

isAdmin().notice: Only the admin will pass this check

makeCharge(uint32).notice: Given an amount, the sender will record a payment with that amount and the block number that was performed on

makePayment(uint32).notice: Given an amount, the sender will record a charge with that amount and the block number that was performed on

participantExists(address).notice: This function checks if a participant address exists in the Ronda

participantStateIsPending(address).notice: Function that checks if participant is on state PENDING

rejectInvitationByAdmin(address).notice: The admin may call this function to REJECT the invitation to a Round of a participant.

rejectInvitationToParticipate().notice: A participant may call this function to REJECT the invitation to a Round.

replaceParticipant(address,address).notice: The admin may call this function to replace a participant in the round  The old participant address and the new one must be provided for them to be changed

start().notice: The admin may call this function to "start" a round and record it start block
